Frequently Asked Questions

You can donate new or gently used stuffed animals by dropping them off at our office during business hours or at any of our collection events. Please ensure all donated items are clean and in good condition.

Our Guns for Toys program allows individuals to safely surrender unwanted firearms in exchange for gift cards. The surrendered guns are properly disposed of, and the funds raised help purchase new stuffed animals for children in crisis. Check our Programs page for upcoming exchange events.

Absolutely! We have various volunteer opportunities with flexible schedules. Whether you can help once a week, once a month, or just for special events, we welcome your support. Visit our Volunteer page to learn more about the different ways you can get involved.

We're always looking for new partnerships with hospitals, schools, first responder agencies, and other organizations that serve children in crisis. Please contact us through this form or email partnerships@savvystuffies.org to discuss potential collaboration opportunities.
Savvy Stuffies

Bringing comfort to children in crisis through stuffed animal donations and gun buyback programs.
